code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:M aged 57 yrs presents via EMS a short time following MVA. he was struck while passing through intersection, and sustained injury to the back of the head (LOC 48 min). Striking vehicle traveling at estimated 20 mph on impact. pt c/o mild vomiting, severe headache, moderate nausea and Traumatic Injury - Blunt. o:Height 188 cm, Weight 104.1 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, MRI Brain Unremarkable, appears in NAD, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Chest = normal breathing sounds B/L, Neuro: WNL, Eyes = normal pupillary reflex a:TBI (concussion) p:administered Acetaminophen - 650 mg po/pr q 6 hrs PRN pain, performed MRI Brain, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed, and ordered rest, and referred patient to family practice/primary care.

he was struck while passing through intersection ,

content2.Value: MRI Brain , and performed E/MALE Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed ,

td.content: s:57 YO male solicitor presents for one (1) week f/u after sustaining a mild concussion (LOC 48 min). he denies nausea, vomiting and headache since the accident. he has had no subsequent loss of consciousness (LOC). he has resumed usual state of function. he reports having no more than one drink a day he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 188 cm, Weight 103.7 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, ImPACT test Verbal Memory=97,Visual Memory=96,Processing Speed=43.0,Reaction Time=0.49, HEENT: NCAT, PERRL, Neck: Supple, C/V: RRR, Pulm: CTAB. Good effort, Abd: Scaphoid, soft, ND, NTTP. BS WNL, MS: Extremities x 4 WNL. Strength 5/5, equal bilaterally, Neuro: CN II-XII WNL. No deficits, Eyes = normal pupillary reflex a:S/P Concussion (with loss of consciousness from 31 to 59 minutes). No sequelae p:performed ImPACT test, and performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed.

content2.Unmatched: he reports having no more than one drink a day he denies ever using cigarettes

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

content2.Unmatched: No deficits , Eyes = normal pupillary reflex

td.content: Do not IV Fluid and Support
